scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a divine representation of the Crucifixion. At the top, a figure with a long white beard and a halo, presumably God the Father, is shown with arms outstretched, supporting the cross. Below, the crucified Christ is depicted, wearing a loincloth. A dove, symbolizing the Holy Spirit, is positioned between God the Father and Christ. The figures are set against a backdrop of golden and blue drapery, suggesting a celestial or divine setting. The scene is framed by decorative borders with floral motifs and vertical red and white stripes.
